page.title: 13DARRINGTON VILLAGE
page.content: Darrington is a quiet,attractive village.In the centre the houses are made of stone.This is the original old part of the village.There are some farmhouses and old cottages and in the centre is the old stone parish church called "All Saints".There is also the old school building but this is no longer in use as they have moved to new premises across the lane.{There is {no General Store in the village}but in our study area there is a Post Office, an equestrian suppliers,a hairdressers and a pub.An old lady who has lived in Darrington all her life told us of a legend about three village pubs.It said,"The Ship will sink,the Crown will fall but the Eagle will fly on forever".The first two have long ceased to exist but the pub in our area is called The Spread Eagle.
